title: Typeface for Nationale Toneel Ads (NL)
author: Amber Dean

comments.content:
Definitely bespoke and according to their [css code](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132012/http:/www.nationaletoneel.nl/) named 'Nationale Toneel' (Medium) copyrighted to Stephan Achterberg, co-founder of Van Lennep.  
To me, that looks like a custom job based on Berton Hasebe's [Platform](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317132012/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fcommercialtype.com/typefaces/platform) with main differences on /a, /k and /t.
Looks like you are right. Thanks very much!
